div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 419 Cittavecchia, Lesina (anc. Pharos), (254) Dalmatia, Yugoslavia, 1836 Burial: 4th cent. B.C.? (T) Contents: c. 162 AE Heracleia, Illyria: 49 Issa: 55 Pharos: 58 Disposition: unknown Steinbüchel, Num J 1837, p. 165 Rathgeber, Bull.dell' InstCorrArch 1838, pp. 89-91,93-4 Ljubić, AfÖG 11 (1853), pp. 132-5 Brunsmid, Die Inschriften and Münzen der griechischen Städte Dalmatians (Vienna, 1898), p. 35 See also no. 418 above
